thread.title: Customer, Dublin.
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Customer, Dublin.

author: Customer, Dublin.
title: Customer, Dublin.
text: I recently purchased some Pablosky shoes for my boy and Tuc Tuc shorts for my girl. The selection of quality branded shoes is excellent and I was happy to see that although they were new in, they was a price reduction on them too. We are very happy with them. The shorts had a 70% reduction on them and are lovely but are too small. I am a bit disappointed about that as I ordered an age 10 and she is 9 and is petite for her age and normally fits age 8-9 or 9-10. Anyway, I know I can return them but I'll keep them and give them to my 7 year old niece in the hope they fit her.
